author: ColdFusion
description:
Go to https://buyraycon.com/coldfusionOPEN to get up to 30% off during Raycon’s Black Friday and Cyber Monday Sale.
These days people are in search of companionship but tech companies are treating it like another problem that has to be solved. One of the latest efforts in this space is Friend.com. An AI pendant that serves as your very own digital buddy. The product itself has seen terrible reviews and has a lot of people asking the question “do we really need this?” 
In this video we explore.

Watch or listen to ColdFusion on Spotify: https://open.spotify.com/show/1YEwCKoRz8fEDqheXB6UJ1

title: The Worst Tech Product of the Century [Friend.com]
